data.name: Smackit hamster
data.detailed_description:
A group of hamsters suddenly appeared. Your mission is to kill more hamsters in 60 seconds.

Enter the game of playing hamster

In a square area, you can't move.

When the hamster comes out, left click on it.

In the game, there are many caves where the hamster will stick its head out. We need to click on their heads as much as possible in 60 seconds - kill them. Now let's try!

Game features: stimulate the nerve of the small game, the feeling is not the same as the hamster!

Many games can't match the pleasure of playing hamster, who dare to give it a hammer, simple and rough. But see that one by one beaten the image of the hamster, but the heart has unspeakable pleasure.

1. Concentrate on it and use both hands and eyes.

2. You will see the lovely hamster, don't be soft hearted, still hit it.

3. Not only fast but also accurate!

Game control mode: click the left mouse button to stretch out the head of the hamster

data.short_description: A group of hamsters suddenly appeared, hoping that you can eliminate more hamsters in a certain period of time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/8/9 64
  • Processor: AMD or Intel，2.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7850, NVIDIA GeForce 660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
